text: In the far reaches of the galaxy, a group of misfits thrown together by fate must navigate their differences to become the unlikely heroes we need.
The beauty of space is unparalleled, but so are its dangers. It's a vast, open expanse filled with wonders and horrors beyond our wildest imaginations.
Music has the power to transcend time and space, to bring people together, and even to save the galaxy on more than one occasion.
There's nothing like a good blaster at your side, but in the end, it's your wits and your heart that will keep you alive out here.
They say every hero has a story, but what about a group of heroes who didn't even want to be heroes in the first place?
Sometimes, the best family is the one you make for yourself in the most unlikely places and with the most unlikely people.
A talking raccoon and a walking tree might sound like the setup to a bad joke, but in this galaxy, they're the best backup you could ask for.
The line between hero and outlaw is often a matter of perspective. In our case, it's also a matter of convenience.
No matter how far you run, your past has a way of catching up with you. But it's how you face it that defines who you are.
In a universe filled with shining stars, dark spaces, and unimaginable entities, finding your place in the cosmos is the greatest adventure of all.
